text: Hi Ken, any information regarding our HubSpot for Startups program would be located here: <https://www.HubSpot.com/startups>
There are also some offers for startups that can be seen here: <https://www.HubSpot.com/startups/resources/offers>
I am working through some flexbox content and trying to really utilize the inline styling. Any suggestions about which channel I should jump into?
